mainSequence.step: Visitor asks for the tricks list page.
User Interface activates to respond to the visitor's request.
The User Interface directs the execution of the use-case.
The Domain layer is activated to handle the use-case execution.
The Domain layer communicates with the Infrastructure to fetch the tricks list from the database.
The Infrastructure retrieves the tricks list and sends it back to the Domain layer.
The User Interface receives the list of tricks from the Domain layer.
The User Interface presents the response to the Visitor.
The Domain layer deactivates after completing its tasks.
The User Interface renders the tricks page for the Visitor.
